question: S.C. Bose served as the president of Indian National Congress in which of the following session?
explanation: S.C. Bose served as the president of Indian National Congress in Haripura session of 1938. That time INC had divided among two groups based upon the ideology. Haripura session showed the differences between Gandhi and Bose over their attitudes towards the Great Britain. Bose quoted "Britain’s Peril is India’s Opportunity".
